caption.title: Structure of the SARS-CoV-2 S protein.
caption.p: a Schematic representation of the SARS-CoV-2 spike. bâ€“ c The S protein RBD closed and opened status. d The S protein binds to ACE2 with opened RBD in the S1 subunit. e The six-helix structure formed by HR1 and HR2 of the S2 subunit.
